code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import blogsReducer from'./reducers/blogsReducer';import errorReducer from'./reducers/errorReducer';import validReducer from'./reducers/validReducer';import userReducer from'./reducers/userReducer';import usersReducer from'./reducers/usersReducer';var createReduxStore=function createReduxStore(){var store=configureStore({reducer:{blogs:blogsReducer,error:errorReducer,valid:validReducer,user:userReducer,users:usersReducer}});return store;};export default createReduxStore;
